sn24.1:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane.
sn24.1:1.3: “kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.1:1.4: ‘na vata vayanti, na najjo sandanti, na gabbhiniyo vijayanti, na candimasuriya udenti va apenti va esikatthayitthita’”ti?
sn24.1:2.1: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma bhagavamnettika bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu vata, bhante, bhagavantanneva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
sn24.1:2.2: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
sn24.1:2.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
sn24.1:3.1: “Rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.1:3.2: ‘na vata vayanti, na najjo sandanti, na gabbhiniyo vijayanti, na candimasuriya udenti va apenti va esikatthayitthita’ti.
sn24.1:3.6: vinnane sati, vinnanam upadaya, vinnanam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.1:3.7: ‘na vata vayanti, na najjo sandanti, na gabbhiniyo vijayanti, na candimasuriya udenti va apenti va esikatthayitthita’ti.
sn24.1:3.11: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn24.1:3.13: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.1:3.14: ‘na vata vayanti, na najjo sandanti, na gabbhiniyo vijayanti, na candimasuriya udenti va apenti va esikatthayitthita’”ti?
sn24.1:4.6: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn24.1:4.8: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.1:4.9: ‘na vata vayanti, na najjo sandanti, na gabbhiniyo vijayanti, na candimasuriya udenti va apenti va esikatthayitthita’”ti?
sn24.1:4.11: “Yampidam dittham sutam mutam vinnatam pattam pariyesitam anuvicaritam manasa tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn24.1:4.13: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn24.1:4.15: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.1:4.16: ‘na vata vayanti, na najjo sandanti, na gabbhiniyo vijayanti, na candimasuriya udenti va apenti va esikatthayitthita’”ti?
sn24.1:5.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa imesu ca thanesu kankha pahina hoti, dukkhepissa kankha pahina hoti, dukkhasamudayepissa kankha pahina hoti, dukkhanirodhepissa kankha pahina hoti, dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadayapissa kankha pahina hoti—
sn24.1:5.2: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasavako sotapanno avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
